All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
APIClient
APIClient class handles the interaction with external APIs to fetch course recommendations based on user interests.
Application
 
ComboBox
 
Counselor
The `Counselor` class represents a counselor with a name and email.
Course
The Course class represents a course within the system, providing functionality for managing course prerequisites, fulfilling graduation requirements, and tracking courses per grade level.
Course.FileCourseData
A helper class to represent the course data in JSON format.
CourseAssembly
The CourseAssembly class is responsible for managing course data, including recommending courses based on user input, reading credentials, and running course assessments.
CreateAccount
 
CreateAccount.AccountCreationStatus
 
DashboardForm
 
Deployment
The Deployment interface defines a contract for running an API-related task.
DynamicFormLoader
 
EditButtonListener
 
EmailUtil
The `EmailUtil` class provides utility methods for validating email addresses and checking email registrations.
EncryptionUtil
Utility class for handling encryption, decryption, and code verification logic.
ExcelUtility
Utility class for handling course data stored in an Excel file.
FillCourses
 
ForgotPasswordForm
 
ForgotPasswordUtil
 
Form1
 
Form2
 
Form3
 
Form4
 
Form5
 
FormsManager
 
JsonToPdfConverter
This class provides functionality to generate a PDF document from a JSON file containing recommended course information.
JsonUtil
Utility class for reading and writing JSON data related to users and courses.
LoginForm
 
NotificationManager
 
NotificationManager.NotificationType
 
PageMenuIndicator
 
PasswordChangeForm
 
PasswordStrengthStatus
 
PythonAPI
The PythonAPI class implements the Deployment interface and provides functionality to run a Python script as an external process from a Java application.
RegisterForm
 
SendEmail
This class handles the functionality for sending emails related to the Course Recommender system.
StudentCounselor
The abstract class `StudentCounselor` is responsible for managing the mapping of student last names to their respective counselor information.
TwoFactorAuthentication
 
User
Represents a user account with personal information such as username, password, email, first name, and last name.
UserInput
The UserInput class represents the information inputted by the user (student), including their interests, previous courses, grade level, track, and username.
UsersUtil
Utility class for managing and retrieving user information.
VerificationForm
